column3:
I've also wondered about this tss line. But I was afraid to remove it, as
it looks dangerous.

Let's try if it does't break the gitian build...
While you are trying, I have another thing for you to test :) ... if you want. My build on Windows works great with "-fstack-protector-all" enabled :) (set in the .pro file).\n
ACK. I tested building in gitian.\n
